Conferences

  • E. Uruñuela, C. Sava-Segal, M. Leung, E.S. Finn, C. Caballero-Gaudes. A Multi-Subject Deconvolution Algorithm for the Analysis of Naturalistic fMRI Data. (2023). ISMRM Iberian Chapter 3rd Annual Meeting. Oral Scientific session, Best presentation.
  • E. Uruñuela, C. Sava-Segal, M. Leung, E.S. Finn, C. Caballero-Gaudes. A Multi-Subject Deconvolution Algorithm for the Analysis of Naturalistic fMRI Data. (2023). ISMRM 32nd Annual Meeting & Exhibition. Best abstract, Suma Cum Laude Merit Award, Oral Scientific session.
  • E. Uruñuela, M.A. Veganzones, C. Caballero-Gaudes. Exploring Tensor Decomposition as an Alternative to ICA for Denoising Multi-Echo fMRI Data. (2023). ISMRM 32nd Annual Meeting & Exhibition. Oral Scientific session.
